title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Computational Thinking Foundations for Novice Undergraduates

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone proficiency and general awareness of social issues
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze everyday social problems through logical steps (decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, algorithms) to design solutions
Learners can apply self-monitoring and adjustment strategies during the problem-solving process through project execution
Learners can express problem-solving outcomes using simple data visualization tools in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
